EventStructure Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»Structure»MultiFrameStructure. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Dynamic Terminal (Left)Gets a reference to the dynamic terminal on the left side of the Event structure. Details
Dynamic Terminal (Right)Gets a reference to the dynamic terminal on the right side of the Event structure. Details
Dynamic Terminals Visible?Sets whether the Event structure dynamic terminals are visible. Details
Event SelectorsGets the human-readable names of the Event structure cases. Details
Number of Event FramesGets the number of subdiagrams, or event cases, owned by the Event structure. Details
Timeout TerminalGets a reference to the Timeout terminal of the Event structure. Details
